topic.title: MP5306.502 Air Force Competition and Commercial Advocacy Program

body.p: This Mandatory Procedure (MP) implements, in part, AFPD 64-1, The Contracting System, and 41 USC 1705. This MP provides guidance and procedures for personnel implementing the Air Force Competition and Commercial Advocacy Program.
